channel.title: Pk Probs!
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I'm currently using a devolution 7.0 server source and i have 2 problems with pking:
- How do i make 1 v 1?
- Whenever you kill someone you have to wait for 1 minute until you can see and by that time everyone else can see too.
All Help Is Appreciated!
Thanx. :)
